Description:
The secret door takes you to a room with a large chest. 

You open the chest and find some items that might be useful, among them a bright orange potion catches your eye.

As soon as you take the potion out of the chest, its contents begin to disappear. You don't know if it is drinkable, but there is no time and only one can drink it before it completely vanishes.
